title: 'Teenie' Hodges, A Sculptor Of Al Green's Sultry Sound, Passes Away
teaser: A key architect of Memphis soul passed away this week. Guitarist and songwriter Mabon "Teenie" Hodges helped create the smooth, sultry sound made famous by singer Al Green.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
